data_table.description: Subject ID, sample ID, and sample use variable obtained from participants with colon cancer and involved in the "Colon Cancer Treatment Responders" project.

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Type of data submitted. Seq_DNA_SNP_MAF_Sum: Samples were used to generate aggregate mutation annotation file (.maf); Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing; Seq_RNA: Whole transcriptome sequencing
